title: Infinitives + Indirect Statement (Accusative + Infinitive)
learning_objectives: Form present, perfect, and future infinitives (active and passive)
Identify verbs of head, heart, and speech that take indirect statement
Explain accusative + infinitive construction (subject accusative + infinitive)
Distinguish between direct and indirect statement
Translate complex sentences with embedded indirect statements
module_learning_outcomes: Form present, perfect, and future infinitives in both active and passive voices
Identify verbs of head, heart, and speech that govern indirect statement construction
Analyze accusative + infinitive construction (subject accusative + infinitive verb)
Distinguish between direct and indirect statement in Latin texts
Translate complex sentences with multiple embedded indirect statements
